question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Hula painted frog?
1. It is an amphibian and the only living member of the genus Latonia.
2. It is endemic to the Lake Hula marshes in Israel.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Hula painted frog, the scientific name of which is "Discoglossus nigriventer", is an amphibian and the only living member of the genus Latonia. It is endemic to the Lake Hula marshes located in Israel.
